Description:
Project ManagerLocation: IraqSalary: Competitive market relatedOur Client is a Construction Company established more than 5 decades ago, offer all types of services related to the installation of pipelines and relevant ancillary facilities for the transmission and distribution of oil, gas and water on an international basis.Reporting to the Country Manager your responsibilities include coordinating all the activities and information concerning the project, cooperating with HO Offices and Project staff.Additionally, having hierarchical responsibility over the Engineering, Procurement and Construction Manager, required to ensure that the Job Orders acquired are executed in full compliance with the project’s technical objectives, the contractual objectives in terms of costs and times.Assist in the management and supervision of all the construction activities of the project and ensure that the contractual commitments are met.ResponsibilitiesInterface with Construction Manager and Clients, including attending project meetings.
Maintain relationships with Top Management of the Clients.
Ensure the correct application of the terms and conditions of the ongoing contracts.
Monitoring of project resources identifying potential optimizations.
Prepare reports, consolidating progress and highlighting areas of concern.
Monitor the overall project/s performance in terms of scheduling, cost, quality and HSE requirements.
Oversee budget and ensure financial accountability.
Identify potential contractual Change Orders and Claims, and coordinate their preparation: negotiate withClient and control the pricing variations of the contract.Foresee clients’ requirements and be able to provide appropriate and precise solutions.
Support the Procurement and Engineering TeamsSkills
Skills:
Certified Project Management Professional PMP.
Engineering degree.
Good knowledge (written and spoken) of English and preferably Italian although not essential
At least 10 years' experience in a similar position in Oil & Gas sector for an EPC project.
Previous experience in gas compressors would be considered as an advantage
Good interpersonal, strong communication skills and a results-orientated individual is a must.
Ability to motivate Team and manage personnel.
Strong Organizational Skills
